name.description: Name of the individual test/rule/alert that was executed. Unique, not exposed to the customer.

displayName.description: The health check DisplayName localized of the individual test executed.

tags.description: Key-value pairs that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

key.description: Key that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

value.description: Value of the key that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

title.description: User-facing name; one or more sentences indicating the direct issue.

status.description: The status of the check running (i.e. Failed, Succeeded, In Progress). This answers whether the check ran, and passed or failed.

severity.description: Severity of the result (Critical, Warning, Informational, Hidden). This answers how important the result is. Critical is the only update-blocking severity.

description.description: Detailed overview of the issue and what impact the issue has on the stamp.

remediation.description: Set of steps that can be taken to resolve the issue found.

targetResourceID.description: The unique identifier for the affected resource (such as a node or drive).

targetResourceName.description: The name of the affected resource.

timestamp.description: The Time in which the HealthCheck was called.

additionalData.description: Property bag of key value pairs for additional information.

healthCheckSource.description: The name of the services called for the HealthCheck (I.E. Test-AzureStack, Test-Cluster).
